name: Vina Center Hotel
address: 11C Nguyễn Công Trứ, Huế, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc cách Cầu Tràng Tiền 13 phút đi bộ, Vina Center Hotel cung cấp chỗ nghỉ 3 sao ở Huế, đồng thời có sân hiên, nhà hàng và quầy bar. Chỗ nghỉ cách Chợ Đông Ba khoảng 1.8 km, Bảo tàng Museum of Royal Antiquities 2.8 km và Tử Cấm Thành 3.9 km. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Tại Vina Center Hotel, mỗi phòng đều được thiết kế có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Khách có thể thưởng thức bữa sáng thực đơn à la carte, kiểu Á hoặc món chay tại chỗ nghỉ.

Chỗ nghỉ cách Hồ Tịnh Tâm 4 km và Chùa Thiên Mụ 6.5 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay quốc tế Phú Bài, cách Vina Center Hotel 14 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên thân thiện, vị trí trung tâm thuận tiện

review.rating: Vị trí trung tâm, đầy đủ tiện nghi, giá rẻ. Nên thuê nhé mọi người
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân nhiệt tình, phòng rộng. Gồm 1 giường đôi nhỏ và 1 giường đơn. Giá rẻ
review.comment_negative: Nhận phòng hơi muộn 14h chưa có phòng

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, địa điểm gần trung tâm
review.comment_negative: Đèn trong phòng màu vàng

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Ăn sáng ít món nhg ngon. Luôn được refill nước lọc trong phòng. Nước tắm vòi sen rất mạnh
review.comment_negative: Phòng hơi tối

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn sạch sẽ, nhân viên hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, gần phố đi bộ, có nhiều khu ăn uống xung quanh.
review.comment_negative: Phòng tôi ở bửa đầu máy lạnh kêu khá lớn, nên tôi phải dùng quạt.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Excellent location, great staff, comfortable room, good price.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: friendly staff, nice breakfast (soup, omelette, ...) , walking distance to the city centre, washing service available

review.rating: I enjoyed my stay and the location was ok.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is good close to a lot of what seems the main tourist area in Hue. WIFI was excellent and the staff at the hotel were helpful friendly and spoke relatively good english.
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast options were limited but still ok. Once again though Booking.com site states a restaurant. No restaurant so when using booking.com realise especially in Vietnam accuracy will be low on services at properties.
Fair amount of noise as rooms not well insulated.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We liked the location and the big clean rooms. We only stayed here for a last minute night to recover from food poisoning. Good staff and easy check in process.
review.comment_negative: They gave us water in glass bottles which was warm. We put the bottles in the fridge and when we opened the fridge one fell out and smashed. I’m not sure whose idea it was to put glass water bottles in the room. My partner went downstairs to get more water and it was given to us in plastic bottles for free, so I don’t know why the glass bottles were needed. We then got charged for smashing the bottle even though the fridge was not equipped to hold them. Bad planning by the hotel.

review.rating: Great value, location, and comfortable accommodation
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Great value, good location, friendly and helpful staff. It had everything we needed, and the breakfast was nice as well! I would definitely recommend and a comfortable budget accommodation.
review.comment_negative: The room was a bit smelly and we couldn't keep the windows open in the evening because there was no screen for mosquitos, but the air conditioning mostly worked (a little weak), and when we realized the fan would only work with the lights on, a staff member came up and checked and brought us a different standing fan, which was nice

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên thân thiện, vị trí trung tâm thuận tiện

review.comment_positive: Khách sạn sạch sẽ, nhân viên hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, gần phố đi bộ, có nhiều khu ăn uống xung quanh.
review.comment_negative: Phòng tôi ở bửa đầu máy lạnh kêu khá lớn, nên tôi phải dùng quạt.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Excellent location, great staff, comfortable room, good price.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: friendly staff, nice breakfast (soup, omelette, ...) , walking distance to the city centre, washing service available

review.rating: I enjoyed my stay and the location was ok.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The location is good close to a lot of what seems the main tourist area in Hue. WIFI was excellent and the staff at the hotel were helpful friendly and spoke relatively good english.
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast options were limited but still ok. Once again though Booking.com site states a restaurant. No restaurant so when using booking.com realise especially in Vietnam accuracy will be low on services at properties.
Fair amount of noise as rooms not well insulated.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: We liked the location and the big clean rooms. We only stayed here for a last minute night to recover from food poisoning. Good staff and easy check in process.
review.comment_negative: They gave us water in glass bottles which was warm. We put the bottles in the fridge and when we opened the fridge one fell out and smashed. I’m not sure whose idea it was to put glass water bottles in the room. My partner went downstairs to get more water and it was given to us in plastic bottles for free, so I don’t know why the glass bottles were needed. We then got charged for smashing the bottle even though the fridge was not equipped to hold them. Bad planning by the hotel.

review.rating: Great value, location, and comfortable accommodation
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Great value, good location, friendly and helpful staff. It had everything we needed, and the breakfast was nice as well! I would definitely recommend and a comfortable budget accommodation.
review.comment_negative: The room was a bit smelly and we couldn't keep the windows open in the evening because there was no screen for mosquitos, but the air conditioning mostly worked (a little weak), and when we realized the fan would only work with the lights on, a staff member came up and checked and brought us a different standing fan, which was nice

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên thân thiện, vị trí trung tâm thuận tiện

review.rating: Vị trí trung tâm, đầy đủ tiện nghi, giá rẻ. Nên thuê nhé mọi người
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân nhiệt tình, phòng rộng. Gồm 1 giường đôi nhỏ và 1 giường đơn. Giá rẻ
review.comment_negative: Nhận phòng hơi muộn 14h chưa có phòng

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, địa điểm gần trung tâm
review.comment_negative: Đèn trong phòng màu vàng

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Ăn sáng ít món nhg ngon. Luôn được refill nước lọc trong phòng. Nước tắm vòi sen rất mạnh
